description: My name is Arshad Ahamed Experienced technical support engineer proficient in AI chatbot utilization for issue resolution and adept at maintaining comprehensive data on resolved issues.

description.institution: Sir. M. Visveswaraya P.U Science College, Lingsugur

projects: Implemented AI-driven technical support solution using Zendesk with Answer Bot integration.
Enhanced chatbot performance and accuracy through Python scripting.
Maintained MySQL database of resolved issues for future analysis and improvement.
Led integration of Microsoft Dynamics CRM with AI chatbot functionalities.
Utilized Power BI and Power Automate for support data analysis.
Implemented Google Docs for collaborative documentation.
Utilized OpenAI API for advanced language processing in issue resolution.

description: Zendesk (with Answer Bot), Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Microsoft 365, Power BI, Power Automate, Python Script, MySQL, Google Docs, Command line windows and Open AI API.
Troubleshoot technical issues reported by users through AI chatbots, providing timely and effective resolutions.
Utilize AI tools to continuously improve chatbot performance and accuracy in understanding user queries.
Maintain and update databases with detailed records of resolved issues, contributing to data-driven insights for future improvements.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI chatbot functionalities into existing support systems.
Provide training and support to users and colleagues on utilizing AI chatbots effectively for issue resolution and data management.
Strong problem-solving abilities to efficiently diagnose and address issues, often under time constraints.
Patience and empathy in dealing with frustrated or confused users, ensuring a positive support experience.
Adaptability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies and tools in a fast-paced technical environment.
Building Systems with the ChatGPT API
